extDescription.message: Record, edit, and automate your repetitive browser tasks with a simple visual editor.

newScenario.description: Button to create a new scenario.

startRecording.description: Button to start recording user actions.

saveScenario.description: Button to save the changes in the editor.

backToList.description: Button to return from the editor to the scenario list.

scenarioName.description: Label for the scenario name input field.

scenarioEditor.description: Title for the scenario editor view.

noBlocks.message: No steps recorded yet. Add a step or start recording.
noBlocks.description: Message shown when a scenario has no blocks.

exportScenario.description: Button to export a scenario as a JSON file.

importScenario.description: Button to import a scenario from a JSON file.

recordingInProgress.description: Status text shown when recording is active.

steps.description: Header for the list of blocks/steps in the editor.

addStep.description: Title for the section to add new steps.

addGoToURLStep.description: Button to add a 'Go To URL' step.

addIfElseBlock.description: Button to add a conditional If/Else block.

addLoopBlock.description: Button to add a Loop block.

deleteStep.description: Tooltip or label for the delete step button.

statusIdle.description: Status text when the scenario runner is idle.

statusRunning.description: Status text when the scenario is running.

statusSuccess.description: Status text when the scenario has finished successfully.

statusError.description: Status text when the scenario has failed.
